message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value to both of us, I propose a price of $11000 for it. This is a special offer considering its worth to you and my willingness to accommodate your budget.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering the value you place on the product, I would like to counter your offer with a price of $10500. This is a bit higher than your proposal but still offers some flexibility within the context of the product's value to both parties.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I still think $9500 is a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'll offer $10000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
